name: Devarai Crosswords
author: Devarai

sections.description:
Welcome! Drive more traffic to your website with this plugin and also offer the best crossword puzzles from the world’s leading crossword authors – premium content for free.

Every week there will be displayed a brand-new quality crossword puzzle.

The puzzles are provided by our website www.devarai.com
sections.installation:
As usual for standard WP plugins: in the admin section of your WP website choose “Plugins”, “Add New”, select the Devarai Crosswords Plugin and then click on “install”. Furthermore, there is a “Game Embedder” tool included allowing you to easily find the required shortcode. The shortcode includes the options whether to display an English, German, Spanish or Italian crossword puzzle and if the color scheme should be “light” or “dark”.

Just insert the shortcode on one of your pages to show a puzzle.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First stable release

1.1

  • Fixed an issue with scoping

1.2

  • Fixed an issue with automatic height
